text: Amazing skate park for running, cycling and skating! Can work out at any time of the day and in any weather because it’s indoors and under shade. Highly recommended for family and friends gathering to do sports together!

It's a really basic little skate park that I wouldn't recommend. Concrete slabs are bonded with a thick layer of elastic goo that really messed up my timing.
The mini ramp is nice with mellow transition and forgiving coping, but it is extremely narrow. So it looks like a good place for mini ramp beginners, but it's not imho ideal for learning basic slash grinds etc if you like to carve into it (because of the risk of carving out of it).

There are 2 vending machines nearby and SHOWERS (go downstairs, south-east, to OCBC Arena main entrance where there are toilets and changing rooms with SHOWERS .
My second home, the place i go to learn new tricks, to get my mind off work and stress, the place i go to find myself... thanks kallang skatepark
I am surfskate rookie, first time here to practice , I will come back for more practice, spacious for beginners!

Skatepark no comment but the flooring outside the skatepark realy rought to sk8. Realy bad.. hardly to train outside the ska8park for beginer. I often to trained my daughter toutside the skatepark but recently now the making the floor rought its harly to sk8. Inside the skatepark  hardly to trained bcoz just dun to obstruct for those experiences skater. I been fall twice and get cut & abrasion bcoz of the rought surface.
